text: POCL may refer to: * Patriotic Old Comrades' League, a former political party in Myanmar. * Premier Oil Company Limited, a former name of Pakistan State Oil * Power over Camera Link, a Camera Link interface * POCL ("POrtable Computing Language"), a CPU-only OpenCL implementation ==See also== * Phosphoryl chloride (POCl3) * Benefits Agency/Post Office Counters Ltd (BA/POCL), a joint programme started with Horizon
title: POCL
